archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1203
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a prospective customer, I want to be able to know how to contact Vodafone (contact us, initiate chat)

properties.value: Normally solution for chat includes some floating component, visible on all pages, that can be used to initiate chat. More details on the chat integration - during LLD. Probably one solution would be used throughout the SC, DS and VF Portal

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
